title: Slow cooker chicken and cashews
ingredients: ['675g chicken thighs', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 tablespoons oyster sauce', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon white pepper', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped', '1/2 white onion, chopped', 'water to cover', '450g raw cashews']
